item.description:
Demo begins at 6:30pm and dinner at 7:00pm.
Feel free to arrive between 6 and 6:30 or communicate
what time you will be arriving if it will be later than 7pm.


Dushenka is a raw food enthusiast with know how
and will share the secrets to her favorite raw food dishes: lasagna and cheesecake.

Learn some raw food preparation techniques and have a meal with friends old and new.


Menu

Mesclun Salad with olive oil and herbs

Kale Salad with Avocado

Raw Lasagna: squash noodles, cashew "cheese", raw marinara sauce

Cheese Cake with Raspberry Sorbet: principle ingredients include cashew, coconut and agave


recipe book and recommended reading included


$35 per person cash at the door

or

Mail a check of $27 per person, postmarked no later than Monday, October 18th to:

Dushenka Silberfarb
43 Gifford Lane
Concord, MA 01742


Only 11 spaces left so RSVP as soon as you know you are interested!.
item.name: Raw Food Demonstration and Dinner
